data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 2 UNIVERSAL EDITION Der Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Universal Edition beseitigt zuverlässig leichte Verschmutzungen bei gelegentlichen Einsätzen rund ums Haus. ## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer set, consisting of three main components: 1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It has a compact, rectangular design with a handle on top for easy portability. - The front features a vented design for airflow and cooling. - A black circular knob is present, likely for adjusting pressure settings. - The brand name is visible on the front. 2. **Hose**: - A coiled black hose is included, which connects the pressure washer to the spray gun. 3. **Spray Gun and Lance**: - The spray gun is black with a yellow trigger for operation. - It is ergonomically designed for comfortable handling. - Attached to the spray gun is a lance, which is a long, narrow extension for directing the water spray. This set is designed for cleaning tasks, utilizing high-pressure water jets to remove dirt and grime from surfaces. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.673-010.0 - Leichtes, kompaktes Gerät - Komfortable Zubehör- und Kabelaufbewahrung - Quick Connect-System ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529089076
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 110 / 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.4
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3.8
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 4.6
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 182 × 280 × 390
## Ausstattung
Item Details Included
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q [ ]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 3 m [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
- Note: Items with a filled checkbox ([x]) are included in the delivery. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, eye-catching design. It features a large numeral "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping this numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND** The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" and "PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND" stacked vertically. The font is bold and black, ensuring high contrast against the yellow background for maximum visibility. The design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked product in its category. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. ## Description of Figure The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power-related symbol. The icon includes a lightning bolt, which is commonly associated with electricity or power, positioned above a circular shape that might represent a button or a switch. Below this icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow, indicating an increase or enhancement in power by 100 percent. The overall design suggests a focus on energy or power amplification.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 2 UNIVERSAL EDITION

Der Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Universal Edition beseitigt zuverlässig leichte Verschmutzungen bei gelegentlichen Einsätzen rund ums Haus.

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer set, consisting of three main components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It has a compact, rectangular design with a handle on top for easy portability.
   - The front features a vented design for airflow and cooling.
   - A black circular knob is present, likely for adjusting pressure settings.
   - The brand name is visible on the front.

2. **Hose**:
   - A coiled black hose is included, which connects the pressure washer to the spray gun.

3. **Spray Gun and Lance**:
   - The spray gun is black with a yellow trigger for operation.
   - It is ergonomically designed for comfortable handling.
   - Attached to the spray gun is a lance, which is a long, narrow extension for directing the water spray.

This set is designed for cleaning tasks, utilizing high-pressure water jets to remove dirt and grime from surfaces.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.673-010.0

- Leichtes, kompaktes Gerät
- Komfortable Zubehör- und Kabelaufbewahrung
- Quick Connect-System

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529089076
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 110 / 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.4
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3.8
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 4.6
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 182 × 280 × 390

## Ausstattung
Item Details Included
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q [ ]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 3 m [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
- Note: Items with a filled checkbox ([x]) are included in the delivery.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, eye-catching design. It features a large numeral "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping this numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND**

The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" and "PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND" stacked vertically. The font is bold and black, ensuring high contrast against the yellow background for maximum visibility. The design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked product in its category.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing.

## Description of Figure

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power-related symbol. The icon includes a lightning bolt, which is commonly associated with electricity or power, positioned above a circular shape that might represent a button or a switch. Below this icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow, indicating an increase or enhancement in power by 100 percent. The overall design suggests a focus on energy or power amplification.
